pages.text: Qala `Isa Abnu Maryama Al-Lahumma Rabbana 'Anzil `Alayna Ma'idatan Mina As-Sama'i Takunu Lana `Idaan Li'wwalina Wa 'Akhirina Wa 'Ayatan Minka Wa Arzuqna Wa 'Anta Khayru Ar-Raziqina
Qala Allahu 'Inni Munazziluha `Alaykum Faman Yakfur Ba`du Minkum Fa'inni 'U`adhibuhu `Adhabaan La 'U`adhibuhu 'Ahadaan Mina Al-`Alamina

Wa 'Idh Qala Allahu Ya `Isa Abna Maryama 'A'anta Qulta Lilnnasi Attakhidhuni Wa 'Ummiya 'Ilahayni Min Duni Allahi Qala Subhanaka Ma Yakunu Li 'An 'Aqula Ma Laysa Li Bihaqqin 'In Kuntu Qultuhu Faqad `Alimtahu Ta`lamu Ma Fi Nafsi Wa La 'A`lamu Ma Fi Nafsika 'Innaka 'Anta `Allamu Al-Ghuyubi

Ma Qultu Lahum 'Illa Ma 'Amartani Bihi 'Ani A`budu Allaha Rabbi Wa Rabbakum Wa Kuntu `Alayhim Shahidaan Ma Dumtu Fihim Falamma Tawaffaytani Kunta 'Anta Ar-Raqiba `Alayhim Wa 'Anta `Ala Kulli Shay'in Shahidun
In Tu`adhibhum Fa'innahum `Ibaduka Wa 'In Taghfir Lahum Fa'innaka 'Anta Al-`Azizu Al-Hakimu
Qala Allahu Hadha Yawmu Yanfa`u As-Sadiqina Sidquhum Lahum Jannatun Tajri Min Tahtiha Al-'Anharu Khalidina Fiha 'Abadaan Rađiya Allahu `Anhum Wa Rađu `Anhu Dhalika Al-Fawzu Al-`Azimu
Lillahi Mulku As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Wa Ma Fihinna Wa Huwa `Ala Kulli Shay'in Qadirun
